name: Time is out of control
description:
" The time crystal that i have taken from the temple is broken"  says skele

" And I think thats why time around me is changing every now and then. I need to return to the temple as soon as possible to return the Rune , otherwise time will eventually be out of control "

"Time is out of control"  is a game which was build upon the theme of the  GMTK 2020 game jam,  "Out of Control" where time is out of your control.

It changes whenever and wherever. 

And also the environment is interactive but out of your control. Non Playable Characters like your mouse is used to lure enemies towards them and turn on switches and open gates.

Controls:

A-D - Move Left or Right

W - Jump

S - Create Mouse after you catch one 

and that's all... This is a short game with no intros because i got less time to do all the stuffs by my own and was busy creating good mechanics that was on my mind for this idea. But a full version with lots of challenging levels will be coming soon.
